alt_text: Awaken Wine Worm Temple of Yellow Flowers.jpg
img_above_text:
## Temple of Yellow Flowers Awaken Wine Worm
Temple of Yellow Flowers Awaken Wine Worm
img_below_text:
Head through the door on the right when you enter the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Run up the stairs, defeat the Snake Shriff Spirit, and go through the door it was guarding to find the Awaken Wine Worm in a barrel underneath a large tree.
## Purple Cloud Mountain Awaken Wine Worm

img_summary: The image depicts a scene within the Temple of Yellow Flowers, showcasing a large tree and barrels illuminated by sunlight. This area is significant as it contains the Awaken Wine Worm, hidden in a barrel beneath the tree. The player character is positioned near the barrels, suggesting exploration or interaction. The preceding and following text provides guidance on locating the Awaken Wine Worm after defeating the Snake Shriff Spirit and entering the temple.
